title: 3bd Upstair House For Sale In Pelawatte
details:
300 yds from the Pelawatte junction, off DP Wijesinghe MW(formerly Akuregoda Road) on Lt Asoka MW. The new defence HQ is within close proximity.

The property includes:

• 3 Bedrooms with attached bathrooms; 2 upstairs and 1 GF room
• Provision for AC in 2 upstairs rooms
• Living, dining, pantry, TV lounge and balconies
• Separate access to maid/driver living area
• Garage parks 1 vehicle
• Remote entry to garage
• House designed for complete privacy with main living and garden in the back secluded by high parapet walls
• Ample provision for further expansion
• A highly residential area with good access roads with concrete


Genuine buyers only and seen only by appointment.

Owner leaving country and looking for a quick sale.

Price Rs 33,500,000 (negotiable)
